title: Are YOU Ready to Head Back to Black Rock City!?
content:
Black Rock City is just around the corner and we know you’re all rolling up your sleeves and dusting off those burn bins. Need a little preparation motivation? Every day this week (July 17-22) we’re serving up a series of fresh content to guide your journey to BRC 2023. Watch the Burning Man Journal daily for storytelling, useful tidbits on Participation, Leaving No Trace, being a DJ in BRC… and more! 

[Image of BRC 2022 (Photo by Stephane Lanoux; Graphic design by Deets Shay)]
